product_name: Rafters Raftech Willamette Sandals - Women's - 2013 Special Buy
long_description: The water-ready Raftech Willamette women's sandals from Rafters are equally suited for splashing in the surf or enjoying a stroll on dry land. Nylon webbing uppers wrap feet to provide a secure, supportive fit; rip-and-stick closures make adjustments easy. Molded rubber topsoles are contoured to match foot shape; nonmarking rubber outsoles offer reliable traction on wet or uneven surfaces. Special buy.
short_description: The water-ready Raftech Willamette women's sandals from Rafters are equally suited for splashing in the surf or enjoying a stroll on dry land.
